name: Soft Honeycomb / Small Notebook
description:
Beautiful, softly textured paper on cover. Coloured paper interior. 20 white pages. Staple binding. Perfect tiny size to slip in your bag to keep track of lists or record ideas.

Dimensions: 5 1/4 in x 4 in (13.5 cm x 10 cm) 

Please note this a different size than the jotters.

Blank Inside

**All orders placed in British Columbia will include 12% HST, added automatically via Paypal.

>>

name: Handmade Story Beads for Jewelry Making
description:
Handmade beads made from natural, unbleached paper. Each bead is a line printed with the words of a little tale of a young boy yearning for the attention of a certain little girl. I wrote the story, printed and rolled each bead. 

Each bead is approx. 3/16" (5mm) diameter, 1/8" (4mm) high. 

Pictured above are 17-19 beads – I will include 10 in package. Let me know if you need more.

"When he was a young boy, he yearned for the attention of a certain little girl. For months she wouldn’t even look his way, until one day he took the graphite from an everyday pencil, and smudged it in a line under his eyes. That day, when he talked to her, she couldn’t turn away her gaze."

name: Sticky Notes Memo Pad Plum Blossoms
description:
Add a little pretty to your office memos!

I use these ALL the time to write myself little memos. Somehow the digital calendar doesn't doesn't have the sense of beauty as seeing my little note stuck to the fridge. :-)

These are my own photos of plum blossoms from this spring. 

Lots of white space for you to write your notes on!

Pages: 50
Dimensions: Approx. 3" by 3" (7 cm by 7 cm)

**All orders placed in British Columbia will include 12% HST, added automatically via Paypal.
